revised_title: Anatomy and Function of Suboesophageal Centres in Loligo
tldr: The author examines the suboesophageal lobes and ganglia of the arms in the Loligo nervous system, identifying a hierarchy of centres and their functions. The study provides detailed knowledge of the anatomy and connections of these centres, which can be compared with Octopus and other cephalopods for a better understanding of their organization and behavior.
